## Entity.mount() method

Mount one or more Component objects to this Entity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mount(...components: Array<Component>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  components | Array&lt;Component&gt; | Component object\[s\] to mount on this Entity. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

This Entity.
